hanzi-su-wiki:
光

Значения

Светиться, сиять, блестеть

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Идти 儿, держа огонь 火, т.е. факел в руках.

  • Изображение лучей света.

Варианты

灮

purpleculture_examples:
阳光 [ yáng guāng ]: sunshine; Classifiers: 线 ; transparent (open to public scrutiny)
目光 [ mù guāng ]: sight; vision; view; gaze; look
眼光 [ yǎn guāng ]: gaze; insight; foresight; vision; way of looking at things
光荣 [ guāng róng ]: honor and glory; glorious
光明 [ guāng míng ]: light; radiance; (fig.) bright (prospects etc); openhearted
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • ⺌
    • 兀 [ wù ] weak; lame
heisig_chinese_memo: A ray of light is not a wave but made of small photons with human legs.
heisig_story: There are really only 2 primitives here, little and human legs. The 4th stroke that separates them is added for reasons of aesthetics. (If that doesn't make sense, try writing the kanji without it and see how ugly the results look, even to your beginner's eye.) Now if you have wondered what those little particles of "dust" are that dance around in the light-rays that come through the window and fall on your desk, try imagining them as little and disembodied human legs, and you should have no trouble with this character.
koohiiStory1: A ray of light is not a wave but made of little photons with human legs.
koohiiStory2: The ray from Honey I Shrunk the Kids made people little - ha! look at them run around on their tiny legs!
jp_example_words:
稲光(いなびかり): (flash of) lightning
光沢(こうたく): brilliance, polish, lustre, glossy finish (of photographs)
光熱費(こうねつひ): cost of fuel and light
観光(かんこう): sightseeing
蛍光灯(けいこうとう): fluorescent lamp, person who is slow to react
光景(こうけい): scene, spectacle
光線(こうせん): beam, light ray
日光(にっこう): sunlight
光(ひかり): light
光る(ひかる): shine, glitter, be bright
jp_readingExamples: 光る (ひか.る), 光 (ひかり)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You see a triceratops in the distance. But, it's odd. It's perfectly pi shaped (that is, circular). Some kind of piceratops, if you will. The reason they are this shape is because they want to absorb as much sunlight (or just light is fine, too) as possible. They evolved to be round so they don't have any corners casting a shadow.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Absorbing sunlight is natural for reptiles, after all. And a round one can absorb even more light. Imagine it sitting in a round spot of sun, enjoying the warmth. What a rare sight you've come across!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you watch this majestic beast absorbing sunlight, suddenly several dozen feral (こういち)s burst from various hiding spots, spears in hand. Oh no! Those こういちs are hunting this rare piceratops!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine many different (but also kind of the same) こういちs attacking and throwing spears at the piceratops. But, because it was able to charge up in the sunlight, it uses its powers to shoot light in all directions, rendering all the こういちs momentarily blind, allowing it to escape.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A ray of light is not a wave but made of small photons with human legs.
origin_of_ch_char_book: Performing regular religious ceremonies for the gods was one of the major duties of the kings of East Asian countries. (光, guang, light) This character has two components, a crown shining bright and a person kneeling in front of it . This character depicts a king wearing a crown kneeling at an important ceremony asking god for guidance.,An ancient king (3,000 years ago) wearing a crown and kneeling, depicting the character light “光”
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jinwen from " fire " from " Jie ", " Jie " is like a kneeling human figure. " Light " is like fire on people, meaning light shines (Xu Shen, Li Xiaoding, He Linyi). Bronze inscriptions may not be from " Jie " but from " female ", " Jie " and " female " are universally used as human figures.

Oracle is used as the name of the person, "Lin" 2.21.5: "Guang Lai". Also used as the name of the country. In today's Guangxian County, Henan Province.

Bronze inscriptions represent brilliance and honor. Zhongshan Wangding: "The Light of the Fear of the Fallen Sheji". Yu Ding: "Dare to show glory to Yang Wu Gong (Pi)." Jin Jiangding: "Every (min) Yang Jue Guangli (strong)." It is also used as a verb to express glory and favor. Ling Fangyi: "Use all father Ding." Also read as "贶", which means reward. Zai Fu Mao: "Wang Guang Zai Fu Bei Wu Peng." Wang Hui pointed out that the characters from the sound of " light " and the words from " brother " sound are connected. "Historical Records. Biographies of Sima Xiangru: "Listen to the truth but never hear." "Han Shu. "The Legend of Sima Xiangru" "恍" is made "恍". Also used as a name. Attack the King’s Light Sword: "Attack the King’s Light from the start (for) use the sword (sword)." "Attack King Guang" was the king of Wu in the late Spring and Autumn Period, that is, the House of King Wu.

"Said Wen": "Light, Ming Ye. From the fire, in the human, the bright meaning is also. 𤎫, ancient prose. 炗, ancient prose."
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jin inscription from " fire " from " Jie ", " Jie " is like a kneeling human figure. " Light " is like fire on people, meaning light shines (Xu Shen, Li Xiaoding, He Linyi).
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「火」從「卩」，「卩」象跪坐人形。「光」象火在人上，取光明照耀之意(許慎、李孝定、何琳儀)。金文或不從「卩」而從「女」，「卩」、「女」作為人形通用。

　　甲骨文用作人名，《林》2.21.5：「光來」。又用作方國名。在今河南光縣。

　　金文表示光彩，榮寵。中山王鼎：「恐隕社稷之光」。禹鼎：「敢對揚武公不(丕)顯耿光。」晉姜鼎：「每(敏)揚厥光剌(烈)。」又用作動詞，表示增光，光寵。令方彝：「用光父丁」。又讀為「貺」，表示賞賜。宰甫卣：「王光宰甫貝五朋。」王輝指出從「光」聲的字與從「兄」聲的字相通。《史記．司馬相如列傳》：「聽倘侊而無聞」。《漢書．司馬相如傳》「恍」作「怳」。又用作人名。攻敔王光劍：「攻敔王光自乍(作)用鐱(劍)」。「攻敔王光」是春秋晚期吳國國君，即吳王闔廬。

　　《說文》：「光，明也。从火、在人上，光明意也。𤎫，古文。炗，古文。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「火」從「卩」，「卩」象跪坐人形。「光」象火在人上，取光明照耀之意(許慎、李孝定、何琳儀)。

光字的基本解释

光
guāng
太阳、火、电等放射出来耀人眼睛，使人感到明亮，能看见物体的那种东西：阳光。月光。火光。光华（明亮的光辉）。
荣誉：光临（敬辞，意含宾客来临给主人带来光彩）。光顾。光复。
使显赫：光大。光宗耀祖。
景物：春光明媚。
光滑：光滑。光洁。光泽。
完了，一点不剩：杀光烧光。吃光用光。
露着：光膀子。
单，只：光剩下一口气。
姓。

光字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guāng］
［《廣韻》古黄切，平唐，見。］
亦作“灮1”。“炗1”的今字。
(1)光线。
(2)光明；明亮。
(3)色泽。
(4)指神采。
(5)光亮；光滑。
(6)发扬。
(7)照耀。
(8)指三光。日、月、星。
(9)光阴，时光。
(10)景色。
(11)希望，苗头。
(12)荣耀；荣宠；光彩。
(13)使增光彩。
(14)华美。
(15)敬辞，表示光荣。
(16)《诗·小雅·蓼萧》：“既見君子，爲龍爲光。”俞樾《群经平议·毛诗三》：“爲龍爲光，猶云爲龍爲日，並君象也……此言遠國之君朝見於天子，故曰'既見君子，爲龍爲光'。龍光，並以天子言也。”后用以指皇帝的容颜。
(17)指礼乐文物。
(18)血的别称。
(19)空；净尽。
(20)裸露。
(21)瞪，睁大。
(22)好处。
(23)仅仅；只是。
(24)通“廣”。广阔。
(25)通“廣”。充满。
(26)通“廣”。大。
(27)通“廣”。远。

光字的英文翻译

◎ 光
light, ray, honour, merely, naked, scenery, smooth

光字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【儿字部】　光； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页124第06
〔古文〕炗???【唐韻】古黃切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】姑黃切，?廣平聲。【說文】从火在人上。本作灮，今作光。【徐曰】光明意也。【易·需卦】有孚光亨。【程傳】有孚則能光明而亨通。【正韻】輝光，明耀華彩也。又【集韻】太歲在辛曰重光。又諡法，能紹前業曰光。又姓。【廣韻】田光後，秦末子孫避地，以光爲氏。晉有光逸。又【集韻】古曠切，廣去聲。飾色也。或作䊯。

光字的源字形

光字的起名意思

：光是人类眼睛可以看见的一种电磁波，通常指照耀在物体上，使人能看见物体的那种物质，也指光彩，光荣，荣耀，光阴，时光，光明，明亮等义，如阳光，灯光，光辉。

Light
Basic explanation of words
Light
guāng
The sun, fire, electricity, etc. radiate out to dazzle people's eyes, make people feel bright, and can see the kind of things: sunlight. moonlight. Fire light. Brilliance (bright brilliance).
Honor: presence (respect, meaning that guests come to bring brilliance to the host). Patronize. recovery.
Make prominent: Everbright. Guangzong Yaozu.
Scenery: Spring is bright and beautiful.
Smooth: smooth. Bright and clean. luster.
It's over, there is nothing left: kill all and burn all. Eat up and run out.
Exposed: shirtless.
Single, only: There is only one breath left.
name.
Light
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guāng］
["Guangyun" ancient yellow cut, Ping Tang, see. ]
Also known as "灮1". The present character of "炗1".
(1) Light.
(2) Bright; bright.
(3) Color.
(4) Refers to the spirit.
(5) Bright; smooth.
(6) Carry forward.
(7) Shine.
(8) Refers to Sanko. Sun, moon, star.
(9) Time, time.
(10) Scenery.
(11) Hope, signs.
(12) Glory; honorable pet; brilliance.
(13) To add brilliance.
(14) Gorgeous.
(15) Respect speech, expressing honor.
(16) "Poetry·Xiaoya·Liaoxiao": "When you see a gentleman, you are the dragon and the light." Yu Yue's "Quan Jingping Discussion·Mao Poem III": "The dragon is the light, and the clouds are the dragon and the sun. And the image of the emperor is also... This is the saying that the emperor of a distant country is seen in the emperor, so it is said that "when you see a gentleman, you are a dragon and light." Longguang also speaks of the emperor." Later, it was used to refer to the emperor's face.
(17) Refers to cultural relics of rituals and music.
(18) Another name for blood.
(19) Empty; net exhausted.
(20) Nudity.
(21) Stare, wide open.
(22) Benefits.
(23) Only; just.
(24) Through "Guang". broad.
(25) Through "Guang". full.
(26) Through "Guang". Big.
(27) Through "Guang". far.
Light
English translation of words
◎ light
light, ray, honour, merely, naked, scenery, smooth
Light
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Children's Word Department] 　光; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 124 Page 06
[Ancient Chinese] Crust??? [Tang Yun] Ancient Huang Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Gu Huang cut, Guangping sound. [Said the text] From the fire to the people. This is a 灮, this is a light. [Xu Yue] Bright meaning. [Easy·Need Gua] There is Fu Guangheng. [Cheng Chuan] If you have Fu, you can be bright and prosperous. [Positive rhyme] Glow, bright and colorful. Also [Jiyun] Tai Sui reigned in Xinyue. Also posthumously, can Shao Qianye said light. Another surname. [Guang Yun] After Tian Guang, the descendants of the late Qin avoid the land and regard Guang as their clan. Jin You Guangyi. Also 【Jiyun】The ancient Kuang cuts, and the sound goes wide. Decorated color also. Or make a fake.
Light
Source glyph
Light
Name meaning
: Light is a kind of electromagnetic wave that human eyes can see. It usually refers to the substance that shines on objects and enables people to see objects. It also refers to the meaning of brilliance, glory, glory, time, time, light, and brightness, such as sunlight. Lights, brilliance.
光
guāng
一个跪坐着的人,头上有火,
本义是“明亮”的意思。《易经》:
“刚健笃实辉光”。又有“照耀”义。
《尚书》:“惟公德明光于上下”。
沙代光光支 岩
Свет
Человек, сидящий на коленях с огнем на голове, означает «светлый».
«Книга перемен»: «Сильное и твердое свечение».
Он также имеет значение «сияющий».
«Шаншу»: «Сверху и внизу сияет только общественная мораль».
Шадай Гуангуанчжиян
guāng
I сущ.
1) свет; лучи; сияние (излучение); уст. светила (небесные)
太阳光 солнечный свет, лучи солнца
眼睛不能见光 глаза не переносят света
北极光 Северное полярное сияние
理智光 перен. свет разума
2) отблеск славы; блестящая репутация, реноме; почёт; блеск; слава
为祖国增光 приумножить славу Родины
儿子立了功, 父母脸上有光 если сын совершил подвиг, родителям (букв. репутации родителей) ― тоже слава (почёт)
3) милость, благоволение; благословение; счастье
子孙保光 дети и внуки сохранят за собой благоволение (правителя)
佛爷开了光 Будда ниспослал счастье
4) прекрасный вид, чудесный пейзаж
春光 весенние виды, панорама весны
江光 пейзаж реки (Янцзы)
5) время, течение времени
寸光 отрезок времени, время
II прил. /наречие
1) светлый, блестящий; гладкий; глянцевитый; светло; до блеска (также модификатор результативных глаголов, см. ниже V, 1)
这种纸很光 эта бумага глянцевита (блестяща, с глянцем)
光梳头, 净洗脸儿 гладко причесать волосы, чисто вымыть лицо (обр. в знач.: навести на себя красоту, совершить полный туалет, о женщине)
2) славный; блестящий; вежл. Ваш; со славой
光有天下 со славой править (владеть) империей
光吃菜 вежл. кушайте, пожалуйста, закуски (что повкуснее, без риса)
光教 Ваше наставление, Ваши слова, Ваш совет
3) голый, нагой; наголо, нагишом; дочиста, без остатка (также модификатор результативных глаголов, см. ниже V, 2)
光身子 голое тело; нагишом
4) только, всего лишь; единственно, только и знать, что...
光靠你们俩 полагаться только на вас обоих; дело зависит только от вас двоих
光你一个人 один только ты
光骂人 только и знать, что браниться (ругать других)
III гл.
1) светиться, бурно источать (излучать) свет
日月光, 星辰静 солнце и луна светят ярко, звёзды и созвездия ― бледно (спокойно)
2) озарять славой. приносить славу
光其祖先 прославить своих предков, озарить своей славой весь род
3) обнажить, оголить
光着头 обнажить голову, с обнажённой головой (без шапки)
光着身 обнажиться; нагишом
IV собств.
Гуан (фамилия)
V словообр.
1) (ср. II, 1) модификатор результативных глаголов, указывающих на доработку до блеска (лоска) объекта действия
磨光 отполировать (до блеска)
擦光 оттереть, навести лоск
2) (ср. II, 3) модификатор результативных глаголов, указывающий на израсходование без остатка материалов, над которыми совершается действие
吃光了 съесть дочиста
用光了 израсходовать совершенно (материал)
花光了 потратить полностью (деньги)
3) в сложных терминах точных и естественных наук и техники соответствует корням свето- (световой). фото-
光强度 светосила
光通量 световой поток
光敏电阻 фотосопротивление
光电子 фотоэлектрон
光感受器 фоторецептор
光阴极 фотокатод

光

Значения

Светиться, сиять, блестеть

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Идти 儿, держа огонь 火, т.е. факел в руках.

  • Изображение лучей света.

Варианты

灮

Radicals: 兀  (pi, triceratops)
Meaning Mnemonic
You see a triceratops in the distance. But, it's odd. It's perfectly pi shaped (that is, circular). Some kind of piceratops, if you will. The reason they are this shape is because they want to absorb as much sunlight (or just light is fine, too) as possible. They evolved to be round so they don't have any corners casting a shadow.
Absorbing sunlight is natural for reptiles, after all. And a round one can absorb even more light. Imagine it sitting in a round spot of sun, enjoying the warmth. What a rare sight you've come across!
Reading Mnemonic
As you watch this majestic beast absorbing sunlight, suddenly several dozen feral (こういち)s burst from various hiding spots, spears in hand. Oh no! Those こういちs are hunting this rare piceratops!
Imagine many different (but also kind of the same) こういちs attacking and throwing spears at the piceratops. But, because it was able to charge up in the sunlight, it uses its powers to shoot light in all directions, rendering all the こういちs momentarily blind, allowing it to escape.
